com.phunware.android

Class PlacementRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.android.PlacementRequest

  • public class PlacementRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    If you want to get the placement directly, and create your own way of displaying them, you can do so using this object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlacementRequest

        public PlacementRequest(AdRequest request,
                        android.content.Context context,
                        AdListener listener,
                        PlacementResponseListener placementListener)
        Creates a PlacementRequest
        Parameters:
        request - AdRequest object containing all required mediation data.
        context - The context from which the ad request will be made.
        listener - A delegate containing event functions for the ad to call.
        placementListener - A delegate overriding the success or failure methods of the request.
